properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where (RegistryKey contains "\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\EventLog" and RegistryKey endswith "\\File") and (not(RegistryValueData contains "\\System32\\Winevt\\Logs\\"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects tampering with EventLog service "file" key. In order to change the default location of an Evtx file. This technique is used to tamper with log collection and alerting
